summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/01/14 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Standeven'], 'Producers': ['Gub Neal'], 'Starring': ['Robbie Coltrane', 'Ricky Tomlinson', 'Dennis Philby'], 'Studio': ['Acorn Media']} Review Text: Right in line with others in this series. Great writing and great acting. A vintage retrospective look at British Hong Kong at the time of the handover to China also. Review Title: Crime in Hong Kong Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/01/14 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Antonia Bird'], 'Producers': ['ITV'], 'Starring': ['Robbie Coltrane', 'Barbara Flynn', 'Geraldine Somerville'], 'Studio': ['Acorn TV']} Review Text: This story is that of a British vet with 3 tours in Ulster under its belt. He has lost mates and is suffering from PTSD. The anti-American comments and moments are from his point of view. As Fitz says, understandable but not justified. I find the other reviewers a bit thin skinned. If they had complained about the believability of the vet going off the rails, that would have been more valid in my opinion. Review Title: Not that bloody awful if you watch the whole thing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/02/18 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Carson', 'Michael Grossman', 'Michael Robison', 'Jim Contner'], 'Producers': ['David Simkins', 'Robert Hewitt Wolfe', 'Nicolas Cage'], 'Starring': ['Paul Blackthorne', 'Valerie Cruz', 'Terrence Mann'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Review Text: If you read and loved the books, you are likely to be disappointed. But if you view this series with fresh eyes and without preconceptions, it's quite good. Settle back and enjoy! Review Title: Take it as a fresh look Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/05/30 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Reed', 'Marc Jobst', 'Sarah Harding'], 'Producers': ['Chris Burt', 'Damien Timmer', 'Kate McKerrell', 'Michele Buck', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Ted Childs'], 'Starring': ['Clare Holman', 'Kevin Whately', 'Laurence Fox'], 'Studio': ['PBS']} Review Text: If you liked Morse and Lewis, you will like Lewis and Hathaway. Lewis has grown since his time with Morse and following the death of his wife. Hathaway as the erstwhile Cambridge theologian is a wonderful foil to Lewis. Enjoy! Review Title: Murders in Oxford---or Shades of Morse Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr.Who Xmas Specials (Giftset/BD) Review Date: 2015/12/22 Store: Various (Actor, Director) Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['AMAZON EXCLUSIVE GIFTSET WITH BLUETOOTH SPEAKER:', 'Doctor Who: Christmas Specials Giftset with TARDIS Speakers [Blu-ray]', 'For the first time on one complete set, own every Christmas special from the new generation of Doctor Who. David Tennant, Matt Smith and Peter Capaldi all take starring turns in eleven exhilarating Christmas specials that set the Doctor rushing to save the world from an array of dastardly foes including the Master, the Cybermen and even Santa Clause himself.', 'Set includes the following:', '11 Doctor Who Christmas Specials', '(3 discs):', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE CHRISTMAS INVASION', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE RUNAWAY BRIDE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 VOYAGE OF THE DAMNED', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE NEXT DOCTOR', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE END OF TIME, PART ONE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE END OF TIME, PART TWO', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 A CHRISTMAS CAROL', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE DOCTOR, THE WIDOW, AND THE WARDROBE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE SNOWMEN', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE TIME OF THE DOCTOR', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 LAST CHRISTMAS', 'TARDIS Bluetooth Speaker', "This Doctor Who TARDIS Wireless Bluetooth Speaker will seamlessly pair with most any Bluetooth device. It features meticulous craftsmanship and incredible sound quality, making it highly desirable to collectors and audiophiles alike. The easy-to-use interface allows for an array of control options, while LED indicators let you know when you power the device on and when you're connected.", 'Features:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Sound clips include Materialize, Dematerialize, Cloister Bell, Flight, and Turbulence!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Top LED flashes and the Police Box sign illuminates! Perfect for Doctor Who collectors and audiophiles alike. Wireless Doctor Who speakers!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Made of super-rigid ABS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 The Police Box sign illuminates when connected to a device.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Auxiliary In/Out for linking multiple models together for surround sound', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Built-in omnidirectional microphone for phone calls with noise cancellation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Multifunction interface for Volume / Play / Pause / >> /', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Battery indicator display / voice battery low indicator', 'Specifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 3 1/2-foot 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and 3-foot micro USB charging cable included', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Connectivity: wireless Bluetooth or 3.5 mm auxiliary', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Wireless range: 33 feet / 10 meters', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Battery: 10-hour life via rechargeable lithium-ion', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Speakers: 2-inch high-power and 2 1/2-inch passive bass radiator', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 USB-rechargeable lithium-ion battery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 TARDIS measures about 8 1/2-inches tall x 4 2/5-inches wide x 4 2/5-inches long.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 For ages 6 and up.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '43382038', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, NTSC', 'Run time': '9 hours', 'Release date': 'November 24, 2015', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: I love the Tardis speaker. It charges quickly with the USB cable. The instructions say it should be able to hook up with your computer if attached by the USB cable, but I have only been able to get it to connect to my aging 2008 MacBook Pro by using the Bluetooth connection. It pairs excellently with my iPhone and iPad also. A total treat for this Whovian.

In a comment to another post I listed all the episodes included in the three disk set, and I am repeating this info below as it is not included in the item information by Amazon. I am giving this only 4 stars because the DVD set arrived with the middle piece to one of the DVD holders half broken, making it impossible to securely stow one of them when not in use. All three DVD's were loose in the case on arrival but fortunately not scratched and all played well.

Tenth Doctor David Tennant specials---
The Christmas Invasion
The Runaway Bride
Voyage of the Damned
The Next Doctor
The End Of Time, Part One
The End Of Time, Part Two

Eleventh Doctor Matt Smith specials--
A Christmas Carol
The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe
The Snowmen
The Time of the Doctor

Twelfth Doctor Peter Capaldi special--
Last Christmas

There is also a bonus feature called Ten Christmases: "in this exclusive new feature Rufus Hound is on a mission to discover what makes a Doctor Who Christmas Special so special!" Review Title: Super gift for your favorite Whovian Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Dish Review Date: 2015/12/22 Store: Rob Sitch (Director), Sam Neill (Actor), Kevin Harrington (Actor) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles Product Description: ['It\'s the biggest event since sheep invented wool! Apollo 11\'s astronauts will walk on the moon -- and the 1,000-ton satellite dish in tiny, sheep-farming Parkes, Australia, will beam that historic first step around the globe. But as giddy citizens prepare for the moment when the entire world will depend on them, the dish flatlines. And its unconventional Aussie crew and its by-the-book NASA supervisor from the U.S. have very different ideas about how to fix it. A culture clash of cosmic proportions erupts in this fact-based tale of how the biggest televised event in history was almost not televised. The Dish, with Sam Neill (Jurassic Park), Patrick Warburton (Seinfeld) and others in a skilled ensemble portraying a spirited array of techies and townies, "will send you to the moon and back laughing" (Bruce Kirkland, Toronto Sun).'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Patrick Warburton, Rob Sitch, Genevieve Mooy, Lenka Kripac, Eliza Szonert, Sam Neill, Bille Brown, Matthew Moore, Andrew S. Gilbert, Roy Billing, Kevin Harrington, Tom Long, Tayler Kane, John McmartinPatrick Warburton, Rob Sitch, Genevieve Mooy, Lenka Kripac, Eliza Szonert, Sam Neill, Bille Brown, Matthew Moore, Andrew S. Gilbert, Roy Billing, Kevin Harrington, Tom Long, Tayler Kane, John Mcmartin See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WARA667702DVD', 'Director': 'Rob Sitch', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 6, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sam Neill, Kevin Harrington, Tom Long, Patrick Warburton, Genevieve Mooy', 'Studio': 'Warner Archive', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I have loved this movie since my first viewing in a theater. Based on the true story of how the television signal made it from the moon to all those TV sets worldwide back in July 1969 -- thanks to a wonderful facility in Parkes, Australia. Get ready to enjoy a story where the geeks are also the heroes! Review Title: Excellent Apollo 11 story from a different viewpoint Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eureka Gesamtbox [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2016/02/12 Store: Salli Richardson-Whitfield (Actor), Colin Ferguson (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama Product Description: ["Eureka is a seemingly ordinary place whose residents lead ordinary lives...at least to the naked eye. Shrouded in secrecy, the picturesque town is actually a community of scientific geniuses secretly relocated by the government to conduct top-secret research. This hit series smartly roots itself in reality, as the drama of the townsfolk stems from life's myriad of everyday challenges. But with the population's unique talents, troubled psyches and limitless resources, these small-town concerns have a way of becoming big-time problems. It is at that intersection, where human frailty and super-science collide - that Eureka begins. Let this Complete Series Collection take you to another place as you watch every episode from each of the five seasons, back-to-back and uninterrupted!"] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, DVD', 'Contributor': 'Colin Ferguson, Salli Richardson-Whitfield', 'Language': 'English', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.47 x 2.8 x 6.89 inches; 1.47 Pounds', 'Item model number': '5053083001292', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, DVD', 'Release date': 'October 16, 2014', 'Actors': 'Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Colin Ferguson', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, German', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures', 'Number of discs': '18'} Review Text: I loved this series and missed the release of the DVD version, so I was really happy to find this region free BluRay edition. It is from Germany and comes with a choice not only audio tracks in your choice of English, French, and German, but also visual subtitles that can be selected separately from the audio, that is you can watch with English audio but have subtitles in German or French or English (or none at all). And it plays great on my Sony US BluRay DVD player.

Comes as a set of 18 disks with bonus materials. If you would like a great series packaged in a great set, buy this one!

Note that this takes a long while for delivery (made it two days after its latest predicted arrival) as it is sold by a third party and is shipped from Germany. Review Title: EUREKA!!!! Great set of DVD's! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tin Man (Two-Disc Collector's Edition) [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2017/08/21 Store: Alan Cumming (Actor), Nick Willing (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Nick Willing, Zoey Deschanel, Alan Cumming', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Publication Date': 'July 20, 2010', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.25 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MCMBRRH2763', 'Director': 'Nick Willing', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Release date': 'July 20, 2010', 'Actors': 'Alan Cumming', 'Studio': 'Rhi Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Wonderful movie I have enjoyed for years. And this one has subtitles! Review Title: Off to the O.Z.! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Day After [DVD] Review Date: 2018/04/25 Store: Jason Robards (Actor), JoBeth Williams (Actor), Nicholas Meyer (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure Product Description: ['The countdown has begun! Against the real-life backdrop of the U.S. deployment of WMDs in Europe during the escalating Cold War, this "dramatically involving [and] agonizingly graphic film" (The Hollywood Reporter) about nuclear holocaust detonated a direct hit into the heartland of America.Starring Jason Robards, JoBeth Williams, Steven Guttenberg, John Cullum and John Lithgow, this "controversial, potent drama" (Leonard Maltin) remains "one of the most talked-about programs in history"(Newsweek)! When Cold War tensions reach the ultimate boiling point, the inhabitants of a small town in Kansas learn along with the rest of America that they have fewer than 30 minutes before 300 Soviet warheads begin to appear overhead! Can anyone survive this ultimate nightmare...or the nuclear winter that is sure to follow?'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Color, DVD, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Steve Guttenberg, Amy Madigan, JoBeth Williams, Georgann Johnson, John Lithgow, Jason Robards, Edward Hume, Bibi Besch, Jeff East, Calvin Jung, Lori Lethin, Nicholas Meyer, William Allen Young, John CullumSteve Guttenberg, Amy Madigan, JoBeth Williams, Georgann Johnson, John Lithgow, Jason Robards, Edward Hume, Bibi Besch, Jeff East, Calvin Jung, Lori Lethin, Nicholas Meyer, William Allen Young, John Cullum See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 1.0)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 7 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Director': 'Nicholas Meyer', 'Media Format': 'Color, DVD, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 7 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 18, 2004', 'Actors': 'Jason Robards, JoBeth Williams, Steve Guttenberg, John Cullum, John Lithgow', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)', 'Writers': 'Edward Hume', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Might not be a great movie but truly an excellent public service message about the horrors of nuclear war. I was on active duty in the Navy in the midst of the Cold War, which always seemed to leave us on the knife’s edge between peace and war. Everyone should see this, especially the politicians, most of whom seem totally ignorant of the effects of playing chicken with nuclear weapons. This will scare the beejeezus out of you. As well it should. Review Title: By the time the missiles fly, it is too late.... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Princess Bride (The Criterion Collection) [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2018/11/01 Store: Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright (Actor), Rob Reiner (Director) Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['From celebrated director Rob Reiner ( When Harry Met Sally ) and Oscar (r) winning* screenwriter William Goldman ( Chaplin ) comes "an enchanting fantasy" ( Time ) filled with adventure, romance and plenty of "good hearted fun" (Roger Ebert)! Featuring a spectacular cast thatincludes Robin Wright ( Forrest Gump ), Cary Elwes ( Liar, Liar ), Mandy Patinkin ( Dick Tracy ) and Billy Crystal ( City Slickers ), this wonderful fairy tale about a Princess named Buttercup and her beloved is "a real dream of a movie" ( People )! *1969: OriginalScreenplay, Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid 1976: Adapted Screenplay, All the President\'s Men'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright, Rob Reiner', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Director': 'Rob Reiner', 'Media Format': 'Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 30, 2018', 'Actors': 'Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Criterion Collection', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Best movie ever and this is a great version. The sound is especially fabulous. I found the picture quaility superior to my DVD Version but I am watching on an older Panasonic plasma 720p HDTV and am totally impressed. As for the packaging, I agree it was poor planning to put the info sheet onto the back of the book, but it peeled off easily and I then placed it on the last page of the book facing the Blu Ray. Easy fix. And the text was lovely, with essays written by both Sloan’s Crosley and William Goldman. Any fan will love this! Review Title: Criterion—-A truly worthwhile addition to your collection! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

The Day After [DVD] Jason Robards (Actor), JoBeth Williams (Actor), Nicholas Meyer (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure ['The countdown has begun! Against the real-life backdrop of the U.S. deployment of WMDs in Europe during the escalating Cold War, this "dramatically involving [and] agonizingly graphic film" (The Hollywood Reporter) about nuclear holocaust detonated a direct hit into the heartland of America.Starring Jason Robards, JoBeth Williams, Steven Guttenberg, John Cullum and John Lithgow, this "controversial, potent drama" (Leonard Maltin) remains "one of the most talked-about programs in history"(Newsweek)! When Cold War tensions reach the ultimate boiling point, the inhabitants of a small town in Kansas learn along with the rest of America that they have fewer than 30 minutes before 300 Soviet warheads begin to appear overhead! Can anyone survive this ultimate nightmare...or the nuclear winter that is sure to follow?'] {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Color, DVD, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Steve Guttenberg, Amy Madigan, JoBeth Williams, Georgann Johnson, John Lithgow, Jason Robards, Edward Hume, Bibi Besch, Jeff East, Calvin Jung, Lori Lethin, Nicholas Meyer, William Allen Young, John CullumSteve Guttenberg, Amy Madigan, JoBeth Williams, Georgann Johnson, John Lithgow, Jason Robards, Edward Hume, Bibi Besch, Jeff East, Calvin Jung, Lori Lethin, Nicholas Meyer, William Allen Young, John Cullum See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 1.0)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 7 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Director': 'Nicholas Meyer', 'Media Format': 'Color, DVD, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 7 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 18, 2004', 'Actors': 'Jason Robards, JoBeth Williams, Steve Guttenberg, John Cullum, John Lithgow', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)', 'Writers': 'Edward Hume', 'Number of discs': '1'} Might not be a great movie but truly an excellent public service message about the horrors of nuclear war. I was on active duty in the Navy in the midst of the Cold War, which always seemed to leave us on the knife’s edge between peace and war. Everyone should see this, especially the politicians, most of whom seem totally ignorant of the effects of playing chicken with nuclear weapons. This will scare the beejeezus out of you. As well it should. By the time the missiles fly, it is too late.... The Princess Bride (The Criterion Collection) [Blu-ray] Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright (Actor), Rob Reiner (Director) Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['From celebrated director Rob Reiner ( When Harry Met Sally ) and Oscar (r) winning* screenwriter William Goldman ( Chaplin ) comes "an enchanting fantasy" ( Time ) filled with adventure, romance and plenty of "good hearted fun" (Roger Ebert)! Featuring a spectacular cast thatincludes Robin Wright ( Forrest Gump ), Cary Elwes ( Liar, Liar ), Mandy Patinkin ( Dick Tracy ) and Billy Crystal ( City Slickers ), this wonderful fairy tale about a Princess named Buttercup and her beloved is "a real dream of a movie" ( People )! *1969: OriginalScreenplay, Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid 1976: Adapted Screenplay, All the President\'s Men'] {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright, Rob Reiner', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Director': 'Rob Reiner', 'Media Format': 'Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 30, 2018', 'Actors': 'Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Criterion Collection', 'Number of discs': '1'} Best movie ever and this is a great version. The sound is especially fabulous. I found the picture quaility superior to my DVD Version but I am watching on an older Panasonic plasma 720p HDTV and am totally impressed. As for the packaging, I agree it was poor planning to put the info sheet onto the back of the book, but it peeled off easily and I then placed it on the last page of the book facing the Blu Ray. Easy fix. And the text was lovely, with essays written by both Sloan’s Crosley and William Goldman. Any fan will love this! Criterion—-A truly worthwhile addition to your collection!

It charges quickly with the USB cable. The instructions say it should be able to hook up with your computer if attached by the USB cable, but I have only been able to get it to connect to my aging 2008 MacBook Pro by using the Bluetooth connection. It pairs excellently with my iPhone and iPad also. A total treat for this Whovian.

In a comment to another post I listed all the episodes included in the three disk set, and I am repeating this info below as it is not included in the item information by Amazon. I am giving this only 4 stars because the DVD set arrived with the middle piece to one of the DVD holders half broken, making it impossible to securely stow one of them when not in use. All three DVD's were loose in the case on arrival but fortunately not scratched and all played well.

Tenth Doctor David Tennant specials---
The Christmas Invasion
The Runaway Bride
Voyage of the Damned
The Next Doctor
The End Of Time, Part One
The End Of Time, Part Two

Eleventh Doctor Matt Smith specials--
A Christmas Carol
The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe
The Snowmen
The Time of the Doctor

Twelfth Doctor Peter Capaldi special--
Last Christmas

There is also a bonus feature called Ten Christmases: "in this exclusive new feature Rufus Hound is on a mission to discover what makes a Doctor Who Christmas Special so special!" Apollo 11\'s astronauts will walk on the moon -- and the 1,000-ton satellite dish in tiny, sheep-farming Parkes, Australia, will beam that historic first step around the globe. But as giddy citizens prepare for the moment when the entire world will depend on them, the dish flatlines. And its unconventional Aussie crew and its by-the-book NASA supervisor from the U.S. have very different ideas about how to fix it. A culture clash of cosmic proportions erupts in this fact-based tale of how the biggest televised event in history was almost not televised. Featuring a spectacular cast thatincludes Robin Wright ( Forrest Gump ), Cary Elwes ( Liar, Liar ), Mandy Patinkin ( Dick Tracy ) and Billy Crystal ( City Slickers ), this wonderful fairy tale about a Princess named Buttercup and her beloved is "a real dream of a movie" ( People )! *1969: OriginalScreenplay, Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid 1976: Adapted Screenplay, All the President\'s Men'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright, Rob Reiner', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Director': 'Rob Reiner', 'Media Format': 'Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 30, 2018', 'Actors': 'Cary Elwes;Peter Falk;Chris Sarandon;Fred Savage;Robin Wright', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Criterion Collection', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Best movie ever and this is a great version. The sound is especially fabulous. I found the picture quaility superior to my DVD Version but I am watching on an older Panasonic plasma 720p HDTV and am totally impressed. As for the packaging, I agree it was poor planning to put the info sheet onto the back of the book, but it peeled off easily and I then placed it on the last page of the book facing the Blu Ray. Easy fix. And the text was lovely, with essays written by both Sloan’s Crosley and William Goldman. Any fan will love this! Review Title: Criterion—-A truly worthwhile addition to your collection! A notable affinity for British and American productions with intricate plots, character development, and historical context is evident. The subject shows a discerning taste for pivotal narratives, especially those showcasing unique cultural perspectives or significant historical events. 

Technically, they are drawn to media formats that enhance viewing experiences, as indicated by appreciation for Blu-ray and special editions featuring superior audio-visual quality. They are less sensitive to high costs when investing in well-reviewed or collectible items, as demonstrated by purchases of special gift sets and series collections. Moreover, there is a trend toward purchasing products with engaging, nostalgic appeal, particularly series connected to beloved franchises. 

Overall, the core preferences highlight a passion for well-crafted series and films, with a desire for quality content, enhanced media experiences, and nostalgia-driven items, coupled with a willingness to invest in high-quality collections that resonate personally.

target_interaction.title: Needs Region Free player— this will not play on a regular North American Region One Player!!!!
target_interaction.text:
Mary Chapin Carpenter in Concert at Wolf Trap on two sided DVD. Short interviews with Mary and others interspersed. Copyrighted 1995 by Sony.

If you are a fan especially from earlier years and have a Region Free Player you will really enjoy this!!!
